categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: "Bruiser" was the nickname of a pilot who served in Banshee Squadron. He was present at the bar "Zero Angle" in the flying base of the Oversector. A brilliant diamond with his squadron companions, when members of Nashtah Squadron provoked a fight between representatives of two directions of piloting - aeronaut pilots fighting in the atmospheres of planets, and spacemen. During the fight, Bruiser was knocked down by Huck Trompo. After the bartender Florn released his astromech droid, Lightning, who had cracked his assault, Bruiser praised his recent adversary for a good blow.
